Container.Name: Huntarr-Radarr
Container.Overview: DEPRECATED: Use Huntarr instead. [br] Huntarr (Radarr Edition) continually searches your Radarr library for missing movies or movies that need quality upgrades. It automatically triggers searches for both missing movies and movies below your quality cutoff. It's designed to run continuously while being gentle on your indexers, helping you gradually complete your movie collection with the best available quality.

Config.Name: Radarr - API Key
Config.Description: API key for your Radarr instance

Config.Name: Radarr - Skip Future Releases
Config.Description: Skip processing movies with release dates in the future

Config.Name: Huntarr - Missing Movies Per Cycle
Config.Description: Maximum missing movies to process per cycle. Set to 0 to disable.

Config.Name: Huntarr - Upgrade Movies Per Cycle
Config.Description: Maximum upgrade movies to process per cycle. Set to 0 to disable.

Config.Name: Huntarr - Use Random Selection
Config.Description: Use random selection for processing if enabled, or sequential if disabled.

Config.Name: Huntarr - Minimum Queue Size
Config.Description: Minimum number of items in the download queue before starting a hunt. Set to -1 to disable.

Config.Name: Radarr - API Timeout
Config.Description: Timeout for API requests in seconds.

Config.Name: Huntarr - Sleep Duration
Config.Description: Duration, in seconds, to wait between cycles.

Config.Name: Huntarr - Reset Interval
Config.Description: Interval, in hours, after which to reset the processed state files. Set to 0 to disable.

Config.Name: Debug Mode
Config.Description: Enable debug mode for detailed logging.

Config.Name: Command Status - Wait Time
Config.Description: Delay in seconds between checking for command status

Config.Name: Command Status - Max Attempts
Config.Description: Maximum number of attempts to check for command status
